anatomists has merely been affirmed,
not <s>int <\s> incontestably demonstrated, yet <s>there 
cannot be the slightest doubt <\s> it is evident that they

connection of the callosal fibres. Gratiolet’s
work was so far in advance <s>ahead <\s> of the times that 
his observations seem to have been neglected or forgotten,
& the purely commissural <s>nature <\s> idea of the corpus
